com.statetable.postfixoperations

Class ArrayStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.statetable.postfixoperations.ArrayStack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stack

    public class ArrayStack
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stack
    Implementation of the Stack interface using a fixed-length array. An exception is thrown if a push operation is attempted when the size of the stack is equal to the length of the array.
    See Also:
    Adapted from the book "Data Structures and Algorithms in Java" by Michael Goodrich and Robert Tamassia
